'''Stormsage''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Stretchy Electro Fungus''' that appears in the [[Lil' Fungi's Fun-Tastic Fiesta]] event.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Stretchy Electro Fungus V3

|name_1      = Conductive Amplifier
|desc_1      = Provides the "Conductive" effect to all Lil' Fungi on the team and increases their ATK by '''40%''' for a period of time. When Lil' Fungi take DMG, the "Conductive" effect will be removed.

|name_2      = Swift Response
|desc_2      = Increases the [[Elemental Mastery]] of all Lil' Fungi on the team by '''180'''.

|name_3      = Normal Attack
|desc_3      = Unleashes a Lightning Bullet, dealing '''200% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
}}
